text: Echallens was a district of the Canton of Vaud, Switzerland. The capital was the town of Echallens. As of 2006 it is part of the Gros-de-Vaud District. It contained the following municipalities: * Assens * Bercher * Bioley-Orjulaz * Bottens * Bretigny-sur-Morrens * Cugy * Dommartin * Echallens * Eclagnens * Essertines-sur-Yverdon * Etagnières * Fey * Froideville * Goumoens-la-Ville * Goumoens-le-Jux * Malapalud * Morrens * Naz * Oulens-sous-Echallens * Pailly * Penthéréaz * Poliez-le-Grand * Poliez-Pittet * Rueyres * Saint-Barthélemy * Sugnens * Villars-le-Terroir * Villars-Tiercelin * Vuarrens Category:Former districts of Vaud
title: Échallens (district)
